NewsArticle.Title: Itemshop Release!
NewsArticle.Content:
New items will be released in the Itemshop on Thursday July 17th.
Take advantage of the July Bonus Kruna Event! $10 Kruna Coupon = 1500 Kruna $30 Kruna Coupon = 5000 Kruna
** Coupons must be purchased starting July 3rd through July 31st and used before August 1st. **
DA Team
